website_summaries.verdict: Ariat designers seemingly found a way to make the Terrain Pro H2O remarkably comfortable and supportive at the same time. They appear to have also made the boot outstandingly watertight, helping many a wearer brave the inclement weather with great success. With all that said, those who would give the gear a shot should be willing enough to forgive its narrow toe box. All in all, the Terrain Pro H2O, while not ideal for those with bulky toes, has more than enough merits to be considered trail worthy.
pros: A large percentage of owners made adoring remarks about the Terrain Pro H2O’s level of comfort
The boot’s supportiveness floored a number of Ariat patrons
Some users only had great things to say regarding the footwear’s fantastic waterproofing
About a handful of wearers were pretty impressed with the boot’s minimal break-in period
Its lightness surpassed the expectations of a few hikers
A couple of reviewers were convinced they bought something worth every penny in the Terrain Pro H2O
cons: The women’s version of this boot runs large, according to a few verified purchasers
This Ariat footgear was blasted by a couple of owners for having a cramped toe box

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boots with defined heal. Wish they made 13 wide!!!
customer_reviews.text: These have been the best boots to wear with a defined heel for a large heavy set guy. Wish they made wide and extra wide versions. Being a 12 1/2 wide - 13 wide I had to purchase the 14 size boot which is loose in length around the foot. I have to purchase other memory foam inserts to fill the area which makes them heavier. My feet do not hurt at least and so far I am not tripping wearing the large defined heel I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true fit!
customer_reviews.text: Husband is absolutely thrilled with these, says they are completely comfortable straight out of the box. He has the standard Ariat Terrains and the h2o ones in the past, but says he likes the more substantial heel and the way there is webbing connecting the tongue to prevent dirt and water getting in. What can I say? Another great pair of Ariats—husband uses these for hiking and horseback riding.
customer_reviews.author: margos

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots they are very comfortable and very light ...
customer_reviews.text: Original pair I bought around 8 yrs ago are wearing out. I love these boots they are very comfortable and very light weight. I wear them both in the summer and winter (although not really meant for the snow) every day and for hiking. Highly recommended !!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Toy

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! This brand has never let me down. I would definitely recommend these boots. They’re not big and clumsy, but they are made of real leather so they can take a beating. I will definitely re-order when I finish off this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Barron

customer_reviews.title: Good boots but not completely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I've had these boots for about a month and a half. I like them, but they are not what I would call waterproof. I walked through some wet spots in the woods where there were puddles and such and while my feet did not get drenched or soaked or anything, my socks were pretty damp around the toes when I took the boots off. So no water got in through the mouth of the boot, but some seems to have gradually soaked down around the toes. It would be nice if they were fully waterproof, but the dampness is something I can put up with because I do like the boots overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots. They were comfortable from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: I am normally an 11 1/2 or 12. In these I am a 13. This is an update. I have been wearing these for most of the winter, and they are very comfortable. They have kept my feet dry in the wet. I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chick

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice well made boot very comfortable and not to heavy can't wait for them to break in .
customer_reviews.author: chuck ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Good shoews
customer_reviews.text: First impressions: good fitting, well made boot. Nice height. Hopefully will wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hanshew

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots but sizing not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Runs smaller & more narrow than similar Ariat all terrain boots. Need to offer a wider size or revamp their sizing. A shame, such a nice boot!
customer_reviews.author: Zentique

customer_reviews.title: Ariat Men's Terrain Pro H2O Hiking Boot
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son. He thought they ran just little small when he tried them on, but stretched out to fit fine. My son loves the comfort & support of Ariat Men's Terrain Pro H2O Hiking Boot
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Very good multi-purpose boot.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, these are great boots for working in and around the barn yet just as good for working aound the house. Keep them clean and the look good enough to wear to a casual wedding as I did. The waterproofing is an added bonus which by the way very good indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you need support
customer_reviews.text: No support I have planter Fasciitis this isn’t good for me
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS M FURNAROS

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again...
customer_reviews.text: Dislike: these boots do not breathe. The ankle collar is not very soft and rubs the ankle. Long break in period. Likes: They are waterproof . Hiking in woods, fields, and small stream crossings.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: feel solid and supportive for the foot, not so much the arch. Not flexible but they are new so maybe that will change. Rubbing on the inside of ankle gave me the beginning of blisters on both feet after an hour of walking. I think they'll be fine though as I had heard they run small so got a half size up. Glad I did that, but they're not a perfect fit. I would have liked more cushioning on the inside, like a Salomon, but these are great value.
customer_reviews.author: mel peppas

customer_reviews.title: Ecellent
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s fifth pair. Wears only these boots around the ranch. Last for a long time. Feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Tough & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and real workhorses. Put through all kinds of rough terrain, and they hold up as always.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frequent buyer club requested!
customer_reviews.text: Love Ariat, just love them. I wear them till they are literally disintegrating. My "good" boots turn into my barn boots quicker than expected. I buy these too often, need a frequent buyer card darn it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Dad's happy.
customer_reviews.text: Dad uses these for workboots. Got them for him for Christmas and he seems to be liking them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Canoe

customer_reviews.title: ... seem to be very well made and are very comfortable. I wore them in the rain today and ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be very well made and are very comfortable. I wore them in the rain today and they kept my feet dry. I hope they hold up as well as the Ariat Terrain H2O. They were $50 cheaper was thr main reason I went with the Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: returned these boots as the fit was loose in the heel
customer_reviews.author: red eye inspector

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ariat makes a great boot and these are great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Timm

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow in toe.
customer_reviews.text: Narrow in the toe area. Usually wear a 12D, but should have got a wide for more toe space. I don't think I'm going to be able to wear these. Guess it's to late for return. Order wide
customer_reviews.author: David in NC

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be very good quality, as expected from Ariat
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing the leather ones for years, decided to try the waterproof. Seem to be very good quality, as expected from Ariat, the only complaint is they were a little tight through the toe box, otherwise great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, durable, attractive. The sole ith many grooves does track in dirt though.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Live up to their description
customer_reviews.text: Work or ride in these. Great for ground work & riding. Feet stay warm & dry. Ez breakin
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You need to wear thick socks with these because they are a bit uncomfortable on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these boots. Would look to Ariat again.
customer_reviews.author: JohnyD56

customer_reviews.title: If they were 1/2 size bigger they would be great but they feel good at the normal size I ...
customer_reviews.text: If they were 1/2 size bigger they would be great but they feel good at the normal size I wear. That size issue was in the reviews I read.
customer_reviews.author: christopher dinoia

customer_reviews.title: ... but within a day he said they felt just fine and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband said they were slightly tight when he first put them on but within a day he said they felt just fine and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: These are Cheaply Made Boots
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply crafted, like a Walmart boot with a Gucci label.
customer_reviews.author: Max Thompson

customer_reviews.title: great show
customer_reviews.text: great construction. great fit to size. A little more stiff than the typical walking show. That is because of the fiber brace. Best walking shoe I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Rob F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is important.. I’m on concrete and asphalt all day 12-14 hrs.. these boots exceed my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Karla Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and wear great
customer_reviews.text: My whole family wears Ariat's. Very comfortable and wear great!
customer_reviews.author: Barb B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable and Well Made.When they wear out I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Fit perfectly and are comfy to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tongue is to short it rubs on the upper part of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A Watson

customer_reviews.title: ... thought they were hiking boots but they are more like work boots
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were hiking boots but they are more like work boots. They are comfortable and nice but the sole is more like a shoe not very aggressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well but I ordered a size smaller. They run on the big side
customer_reviews.author: Airhead

product_meta.title: ARIAT Mens Terrain Pro H2O-M Terrain Pro H2o Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: Gear up and head out in supremely comfortable, all-weather leather boots made to tackle nearly any terrain.
feature_bullets: Waterproof, full grain leather upper, Padded top collar
ATS Pro Advanced Torque Stability technology with composite forked shank
Performance riding boot approved for riding
